item.title: Access Modifiers/Specifiers
item.description: Types Of Access Specifiers Public Private Protected Related videos link 1. Public public members can be access from any part of the program. class Rectangle { public: Rectangle() { length = 0; width = 0; } Rectangle(double l, double w) { length = l; width = w; } double getArea() { return length * width; } double length, width; }; int main(int argc, char const *argv[]) { Rectangle r1(10,20); std::cout << "length :" << r1.
